attributes.action: consider the human rights concerning road tax
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: if the road tax on 4x4 cars is allowed to go ahead, surley those of us with older 4x4's e.g 10years old or above have cars that are probably worth very little e.g £1500.00, now if the road tax on these vehicles is set at £300 nobody will want to buy them therefore rendering my vehicle unsellable at a financial loss to myself, therefore i think my human rights are being affected and that we are being dictated to as to what vehicles we are allowed to drive, whilst government dignitaries drive around in the biggest Gas Guzzelers paid for by us the nations people

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
